sourcesContent:
import React from "react" export default function Stats(props) { // object destructuring coming in handy? let {hp, attack, defense, special_attack, special_defense, speed} = props.stats return (

HP:
{hp}

Attack: {attack}

Defense: {defense}

Special Attack: {special_attack}

Special Defense: {special_defense}

Speed: {speed}

BST: {`${hp + attack + defense + special_attack + special_defense + speed}`}

) }
